name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 6, Shijiazhuang, Hebei Province. Lecheng International Trade City has been selling without a license and making false claims since 2014, causing more than 20,000 people to lose their home purchase money and have not received compensation for ten years. On that day, the owners went to the sales office to complain and demanded the delivery of the house or a refund, but were forcibly dispersed by the Chang'an District Government. During the period, some owners were taken away by the police station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 8, on the streets of Benxi, Liaoning

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/opqdbrt6Ff

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 8, students from the School of Foreign Languages of Changzhou Institute of Technology collectively protested the college's morning and evening self-study policy in the college's opinion collection document.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that the background of the protest is that other colleges only require one year of morning and evening self-study for freshmen, while the Foreign Languages College requires two years. Morning self-study starts at 7:00 a.m. and ends at 7:50 a.m., and is held from Monday to Friday. This means that on weekdays, students must rush to the classroom before 7:00 a.m., and someone will call the roll and notify the counselor. Evening self-study is from 6:30 p.m. to 8:50 p.m., and is held from Monday to Thursday and Sunday, and someone will also check the roll.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, Xiangpiaopiao's stock price has begun to fall, and the live broadcast room has returned to its former quietness. Sales have also fallen from the peak of 1 million to between 5,000 and 7,500 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Q7tEdFUW0z

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 6, Hebei Province, a woman met a white-haired old man begging for food on the road, saying that anything was fine as long as she could eat it, as she was starving to death. After receiving the food, the old man couldn't help but burst into tears.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 9, Nanchang, Jiangxi. In Jiangxi Provincial Children's Hospital, a man tried to jump off a building but was stopped by his family. The man who was stopped could only kowtow to his family.
The child could only watch helplessly from a distance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
During the May Day holiday, Baidu Vice President Qu Jing uploaded several short videos on Douyin, discussing her views on the workplace as a "female boss". Most of her remarks were harsh and harsh, which caused netizens to boycott her.
Due to the controversy, Baidu's stock price evaporated by $900 million. Subsequently, Qu Jing cleared all videos and apologized in her personal circle of friends for the public opinion storm caused by her personal short videos recently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens in some regions have reported on social platforms that WhatsApp can be used directly without using a VPN.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 8, when Zhang Weiwei was giving a speech at the University of Malaysia, he was confronted by a student during the question-and-answer session.
The student asked: "Teacher Zhang Weiwei, I want to apply for permanent residency in Switzerland recently. Can you give me some advice? Ah?" This caused the students to laugh.
According to netizens at the scene, Zhang Weiwei did not answer, but skipped the question.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that Zhang Weiwei has lived in Europe for more than 20 years. In his early years, he published articles or participated in activities in China as a "Swiss scholar". Therefore, this stalk spread.
In 2021, Zhang refuted the rumor and said that the news report at that time was just a momentary negligence of the editor. He has always been proud and proud of being Chinese.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/omAVaGqsAD

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 8, in Guangzhou, Guangdong, citizens took photos of a pile of bricks erected under the overpass at Huangpu District Avenue and Yuzhu North Street, surrounded by barbed wire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 8, Suzhou, Jiangsu. Homeowners in the third district of Moshexi East New Village protested against parking fees outside the gate of the community. During the protest, they had an argument with the police, and the people at the scene shouted "Bandits!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the owners of the community, the community is a resettlement community. Local residents who are relocated do not need to pay parking fees. The owners who buy the houses are charged 100 yuan per month for parking, and the tenants are charged 10 yuan per day. However, they pay the parking fees but do not get a fixed parking space. This has caused dissatisfaction among many owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported online that Qu Jing had previously beaten a "villain" with the name SCMP (South China Morning Post) written on it in her office because of a report in the South China Morning Post.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 9, Hangzhou and Xi'an completely lifted restrictions on home purchases.
Currently, only Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Hainan Province, and Tianjin have not completely lifted restrictions on home purchases.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, Qu Jing has resigned from Baidu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 9, Fuzhou, Fujian. Yutian Town Government forcibly demolished the old houses of Daxi Village villagers.
Villagers questioned the demolition personnel, "You officials make money, but our houses are built with the hard-earned money of three generations."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 30, the newly hired property management company of Shanghai Kangqiao Xiangsong Community was unable to enter the site, and a dispute broke out between the two parties.
It is reported that the owners' meeting in November 2023 decided to dismiss the original property management company and hire a new one. But the original property management company refused to leave. As of the time of submission, the situation is still deadlocked, and the new property management company is still unable to enter the site normally.
